meta.title: Golden Retriever Cost in Los Angeles, CA (2025 Price Guide)
meta.description: Complete breakdown of Golden Retriever costs in LA. Puppy prices, vet bills, grooming, and monthly expenses for Los Angeles dog owners.

h1: How Much Does a Golden Retriever Cost in Los Angeles?
local_insights: Vet costs in LA are 45% higher than the national average.
Dog walkers in LA charge $25-35 per 30-minute walk.
Grooming for a large Golden Retriever in LA typically costs $100-140.

monetization.insurance_cta: Get a quote for LA Pet Insurance
